strength_details: Clear, focused role on BI/DW, reporting, and ETL with specific tool requirements (Cognos)
Established company (IBM) with global presence and delivery centers
Data-focused role without conflation with other engineering disciplines

Potential for overtime in client delivery environment with no work-life balance signals
Limited growth opportunities with no explicit career path or learning support mentioned
Vague on team structure, reporting, and growth trajectory
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years in BI/DW and Cognos experience
Candidates experienced with batch ETL and traditional data warehousing tools
Those familiar with IBM delivery center environment and client-facing work
Local candidates in Pune, India who can work onsite
probe_details: Ask about actual team size and seniority mix in the delivery center
Clarify expected work hours and any overtime or on-call requirements
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting
Understand if there are plans to modernize the tech stack beyond Cognos
leverage_details: Strong Cognos development and admin experience is a key differentiator
Local Pune candidate with no relocation needed is advantageous
Experience with specific ETL tools (DataStage, Informatica) matches requirements
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BI/DW and Cognos experience seeking stable work in IBM's delivery center. Role is well-defined but focused on legacy technology with limited growth signals. Best suited for candidates in Pune who value established company stability over modern tech stack innovation.
